summary: In this context, 'nitrate' and 'Nitrate' refer to the same chemical compound, specifically in the context of its uptake and transport mechanisms in the cyanobacterium Synechococcus sp. The study highlights the role of the NrtC protein as an essential component of the nitrate transporter, indicating that both terms are used interchangeably to describe the same substance involved in biological processes related to nutrient uptake.
